Paragraphs:
This section lists the complete data for the 7-node case referred to throughout this paper. The dataset is available for download from Energy Exemplar along with the network diagram in Excel format.

Figure 7 illustrates the 7-Node network and its optimal power flow for the dispatch given in Table 15 . Note that this is not the economic dispatch, simply an example dispatch for the purposes of validating the optimal power flow. A 'hardwired' dispatch like this can be entered into PLEXOS using the Generator Fixed Load property.

The following tables list the data for the 7-Node system. Table 11: Node Data

Table 12: Region Data

Table 13: Line Data

Table 14: Generator Capacity Data

Table 15: Generator Dispatch

Table 16: Generator Heat Rate Data

Table 17 shows the shift factors computed for the 7-Node case assuming Node "1" is the slack bus. Table 18 shows the shift factors for the distributed load slack case. Table 17: Shift Factors for 7-Node System (single slack bus)

Table 18: Shift Factors for 7-Node System (distributed load slack)
